name: Dinner Tonight: Butter Butter Salad
description: This looked way, way too simple to possibly be any good, and I probably would have never given it a chance had it not had the clever title that is catchy and quite literal. The first butter is actual butter,...

recipeInstructions.text: Clarify the butter. Place it in a small saucepan over medium-low heat and cook until it just begins to bubble. Remove from heat and skim off any solids. Slowly pour butter into a small bowl, leaving the heavy solids in the bottom. Let come to room temperature.
Place the lettuce in a large bowl, sprinkle with the butter and the lemon juice. Adjust to your liking. I probably wouldn’t use all the butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
